sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdeadmin include kcron, kdat, kpackage, ksysv and kuser.

sect3.title: kdat
sect3.para: kdat is a tar-based tape archiver.

sect3.title: ksysv
sect3.para: ksysv is a Sys V-Init editor.

sect3.title: kuser
sect3.para: kuser is a graphical user manager.
